attributes.label: displayed-field
attributes.description: Chooses which field of an item object should be used to create the list and be filtered.

attributes.label: is-clearable
attributes.description: Marks the field as clearable, allowing an icon to delete its content

attributes.label: label
attributes.description: Label to describe the radio group

attributes.label: use-portal
attributes.description:
If true, the combobox uses a Stencil portal to create the menu.
Please use this feature carefully, only if needed.

attributes.label: value-field
attributes.description: Chooses which field of an item object should be used to create the list and be filtered.

attributes.label: config
attributes.description:
Data the FLD must parse to fully be configured.
It must be either an Object or a JSON parsable string

attributes.label: data
attributes.description: Effective data to pass to the component

attributes.label: arc-thickness
attributes.description: Sets how much the arc of the gauge should be thick.

attributes.label: first-threshold
attributes.description: The first threshold, establishing the length of the first and second arc.

attributes.label: label-distance
attributes.description: The distance the label and the value has from the gauge graph.

attributes.label: max-value
attributes.description: The maximum value reachable in the current graph.

attributes.label: measurement-unit
attributes.description: A string which will be appended to the displayed values of the component.

attributes.label: min-value
attributes.description: The minimum value reachable in the current graph.

attributes.label: reverse-colors
attributes.description: If set to true, the colors inside the colors array are used in the reversed order.

attributes.label: second-threshold
attributes.description: The second threshold, establishing the length of the second and third arc.

attributes.label: show-labels
attributes.description: If set to false, the maximum, minimum and threshold values of the gauge are not displayed.

attributes.label: show-value
attributes.description: If set to false, the current value of the gauge is not displayed.

attributes.label: size
attributes.description:
Con be used change the viewbox of the SVG.
By manipulating this value, some customizations of the aspect of the gauge is achievable.

attributes.label: value
attributes.description:
The current value of the gauge.
The gauge's needle points to the percentage based on this prop.

attributes.label: is-button
attributes.description: If true, the kup-html takes the shape of a button

attributes.label: label
attributes.description: The label to show when button isButton is active

attributes.label: src
attributes.description: The address which must be referenced by the iframe

attributes.label: is-visible
attributes.description: Specifies if the current portal instance should be displayed or not.

attributes.label: v-nodes
attributes.description: Virtual node list the KetchupPortalInstance must render

attributes.label: is-visible
attributes.description: Tells the portal instance if it can be visible or not

attributes.label: nodes
attributes.description: Virtual node list the KetchupPortalInstance must render

attributes.label: direction
attributes.description: Direction in which the radio elements must be placed

attributes.label: displayed-field
attributes.description: Chooses which field of an item object should be used to create the list and be filtered.

attributes.label: label
attributes.description: Label to describe the radio group

attributes.label: radio-name
attributes.description: Radio elements value

attributes.label: value-field
attributes.description: Chooses which field of an item object should be used to create the list and be filtered.

attributes.label: debounce
attributes.description: Set the amount of time, in milliseconds, to wait to trigger the `ketchupTextInputUpdated` event after each keystroke.

attributes.label: initial-value
attributes.description: Marks the field as clearable, allowing an icon to delete its content

attributes.label: input-type
attributes.description: Specify the type of input. Allowed values: password, text.

attributes.label: is-clearable
attributes.description: Marks the field as clearable, allowing an icon to delete its content

attributes.label: label
attributes.description: Label to describe the text-input clear button group

attributes.label: max-length
attributes.description:
The max length of the text field.
Default value copied from here: https://www.w3schools.com/tags/att_input_maxlength.asp

attributes.label: placeholder
attributes.description: text for input placeholder
